title: All Ball - Pt. 2: Long Beach State HC Dan Monson on Leaving Gonzaga for Minnesota, Regrets, Perspective, Few Relationship
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 2: Long Beach State HC Dan Monson on Leaving Gonzaga for Minnesota, Regrets, Perspective, Few Relationship
description:
In this episode, Doug concludes his two part interview with Long Beach State Head Coach Dan Monson. They discuss the impact of Gonzaga's '99 NCAA Elite 8 Run, why he decided to leave for Minnesota job, the ups and downs with the Gophers, if he regrets leaving the Zags, and how he's continued to stay close with Mark Few. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
